abilities.description: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 150.

additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
10 and 15 main attack damage to / heroes respectively.
17.5 main attack damage to universal heroes.
name: Dragon Lance
description: The forward charge of the wyvern host grants no quarter.
tips: Dragon Lance is great for ranged heroes that suffer from low attack range, like Luna or Templar Assassin. Those heroes' powerful attacks are mainly limited by their attack range, which Dragon Lance can fix.

Enchantress can throw out very painful Impetus attacks when combined with Aghanim's Scepter, reaching more than 800 attack range. The strength and attack speed bonus are great for her as well, as she is lacking all of that. It can also be built into Hurricane Pike, which is a very useful and complementary item for her.
